SA10n1043:5: bhūmisaṃjñakasarvajñānaviśeṣasya tu ekasvabhāvatvāt tadasatve'nutpannaguṇabhyaḥ śīlapāramitādiviśiṣṭatābhya eva dvitīya-cittotpādādiviśeṣāḥ darśitāḥ |

SA10n1043:18: atha kathaṃ tasya tādṛk śīlasampadā guṇapariśuddhiḥ?
SA10n1043:23: vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyaiva prāṇātipātātprativirīto bhavati nihatadaṇḍo nihataśastro nihatavairo lajjāvān dayāpannaḥ sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu hitasukhānukampī maitracittaḥ |
SA10n1043:29: sa paraparigṛhītebhyo vastubhyaḥ paraparigṛhītasaṃjñī steyacittamupasthāpya antaśastṛṇaparṇamapi nādattamādātā bhavati,

SA10n1043:38: so'ntaśaḥ svapnāntaragato'pi vinidhāya dṛṣṭiṃ kṣāntiṃ ruciṃ matiṃ prekṣāṃ visaṃvādanābhiprāyo nānṛtāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati,

SA10n1043:45: na vyagrārāmo bhavati na vyagrarato na vyagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate sadbhūtāmasadbhūtāṃ vā ||

SA10n1043:48: tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manaāpakaraṇī hitakaraṇī nelā karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇīyā paurī varṇavispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā niśritā bahujaneṣṭā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanaāpā vijñāpannā sarvasattvahitasukhāvahā samāhitā manaḥ prahlādanakarī svasaṃtānaparasaṃtānaprasādanakarī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati ||
SA10n1043:49: saṃbhinnapralāpātprativirataḥ khalu punarbhavati suparihāryavacanaḥ kālavādī bhūtavādī arthavādī dharmavādī nyāyavādī vinayavādī,

SA10n1043:58: avyāpannacittaḥ khalu punarbhavati sarvasattveṣu maitracitto hitacitto dayācittaḥ sukhacittaḥ snigdhacittaḥ sarvajagadanugrahacittaḥ sarvabhūtahitānukampācittaḥ |
SA10n1043:59: sa yānīmāni krodhopanāhakhilāmalavyāpādaparidāhasaṃdhukṣitapratighādyāni tāni prahāya yānīmāni hitopasaṃhitāni maitryupasaṃhitāni sarvasattvahitasukhāya vitarkita-vicāritāni,
SA10n1043:61: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ khalu punarbhavati samyakpathagataḥ kautukamaṅgalanānāprakāra-kuśīladṛṣṭivigata ṛjudṛṣṭiraśaṭho'māyāvī buddhadharmasaṃghaniyatāśayaḥ |
SA10n1043:66: kim eteṣāṃ karmamārgāṇāṃ cayanaṃ prathamacittotpādabodhisattvā na kurvanti?

SA10n1043:151: evaṃ khalu mahato'parimāṇasya duḥkhaskandhasya ime daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samudāgamāya saṃvartante |
SA10n1043:152: “ “punaḥ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ samādānaheto[rdeva] manuṣyādyupapattimādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadbhavāgramityupapattayaḥ prajñāyante |
SA10n1043:153: tata uttaraṃ ta eva daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñākāreṇa paribhāvyamānāḥ prādeśika-cittatayā traidhātukottrastamānasatayā mahākaruṇāvikalatayā parataḥ śravaṇānugamena ghoṣānugamena ca śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvartayanti |
